i1.name: Divine Ascent
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Upon reaching [[Experience (champion)|levels]] 1, 6, 11, and 16, along with spending a skill point, '''Kayle''' ascends into a new form, gaining additional bonuses.

{{sbc|Level 1 - Zealous:}} '''Kayle''' {{tip|on-attack}} gains a stack of [[File:Zealous.png|20px|link=]] '''Zeal''' for 5 seconds, up to 5 stacks, each giving her {{sti|{{as|6% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for a maximum of {{as|30%|attack speed}}. At maximum stacks, '''Kayle''' becomes [[File:Divine Ascent.png|20px|link=]] '''Exalted''', gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|8% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.
{{sbc|Level 6 - Arisen:}}  '''Kayle''' becomes {{tip|ranged}} and gains {{sti|range|350 '''bonus''' attack range}}, for a total of {{sti|range|525}}.

{{sbc|Level 11 - Aflame:}} While [[File:Divine Ascent.png|20px|link=]] '''Exalted''', '''Kayle''' {{tip|on-attack}} against non-[[structures]] additionally launches a wave of fire in the target's direction, dealing {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|type=[[File:Starfire Spellblade.png|20px|link=]] Starfire Spellblade's Rank|6|15;15 to 35|0 to 5}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 10% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit. The wave is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.

{{sbc|Level 16 - Transcendent:}} '''Kayle''' permanently has maximum stacks of [[File:Zealous.png|20px|link=]] '''Zeal''' and gains {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' attack range}}, for a total of {{sti|range|575}}.
i1.notes:
* Prior to becoming {{sbc|Transcendent}}, while at four stacks of [[File:Zealous.png|20px|link=]] '''Zeal''', the next basic attack {{tip|on-attack}} reaching the fifth stack will be empowered by {{sbc|Aflame}}, releasing the first fire wave.
* Despite the visual effects, a wave consists of three 200 units wide projectiles to deal damage and a 4th for visuals.
** {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} can block each projectile individually.
** Hitting an enemy with multiple projectiles of the same wave will not increase the damage dealt.
* The fire waves roll {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}} on each target hit individually.
* Fire waves can be redirected by changing '''Kayle's''' direction via a {{tip|blink}} very early in the {{tip|attack windup}}.
* If '''Kayle''' is in her attack animation after the stacks finish, she gains another {{fd|0.5}} seconds to refresh / stack [[File:Zealous.png|20px|link=]] '''Zeal'''.
* Because '''Kayle''' is both a {{tip|melee}} and {{tip|ranged}} champion, she can purchase both ranged and melee exclusive items at anytime, but their effects will function depending on her range type; the same principle also applies to [[runes]].
** {{nie|Giant Strength}} and {{nie|Lifeline}} from {{ii|Sterak's Gage}} is disabled after ascending to {{sbc|Arisen}}. However, ''Lifeline'' and its secondary effects may be still triggered by other ''Lifeline'' items ({{ii|Phantom Dancer}} and/or {{ii|Maw of Malmortius}}).
* Even after ascending to {{sbc|Arisen}}, basic attacks in melee range ({{sti|range|175}}) do not utilize projectiles.
** This will not negate the activation of ranged effects (i.e {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}}).
** This will still not trigger the activation of melee effects (i.e {{ii|Ravenous Hydra}}).
** Due to this fact, {{cai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{cai|Unbreakable|Braum}} cannot intercept basic attacks while '''Kayle's''' target is within her melee range.

q1.name: Radiant Blast
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayle''' conjures a portal in front of her that faces the target direction. After a {{fd|0.25}} second delay, a celestial sword launches forward from it.

The sword explodes in a cross-like shape upon colliding with an enemy. Targets struck are dealt {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|slow|slowed}} for 2 seconds, and have their {{sti|lethality|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|magic resistance}}}} reduced by 15% for 4 seconds.
''Radiant Blast'' restores {{as|mana}} equal to {{sti|mana|{{as|50% of its mana cost}}}} for each enemy champion hit.
q1.notes:
* The portal is created at the start of the cast time and it does not follow '''Kayle's''' movement, using {{si|Flash}} or getting displaced won't change its position nor direction.
* {{tip|clone|Clones}} are also a valid target for the mana restoration effect.
* The visual effects of the explosion that spreads upon hitting its initial target shows the blade and guard of a sword.
* The explosion consist of 5 hitboxes, forming a cross-like shape. (center, left, right, backward, and forward)[[File:Celestine Wish Kayle_Q_Explosion.png|thumb|The left side shows projectile's width and the total area traveled if it does not hit a target, while the right side shows the explosions when it hits a target.]]
* The resistance reduction is a debuff called [[File:Radiant Blast 2.png|20px|link=]] '''Sundered'''.
* Since patch [[V9.17]], the cast time matches the cast delay.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 60% bonus AD) (+ 50% AP)

  • Slow: %

w1.name: Celestial Blessing
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayle''' and a target allied champion are {{tip|heal|healed}} and gain {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} for 2 seconds.

If cast without a valid target, or [[self-targeted|self-cast]], ''Celestial Blessing'' will automatically target the closest allied champion in range, prioritizing the one with the least amount of {{sti|{{as|health}}}}.
w1.notes:
* ''Celestial Blessing's'' cast time does not interrupt movement and the effects are applied at the start.
* If cast with [[Auto-targeted|auto-targeting]], ''Celestial Blessing'' may target allies who are {{tip|untargetable|untargetable}}, or allied clones that cannot be targeted by allies such as {{cai|Warrior Trickster|Wukong}}).

e1.name: Starfire Spellblade
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kayle's''' basic attacks deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} {{tip|on-hit}}. The fire waves from {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle}} deal damage equal to this value.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayle''' kindles her blade, causing her next [[basic attack]] within 6 seconds to become {{tip|unstoppable basic attack|unstoppable}} and deal additional {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} based on the {{as|target's '''missing''' health}} {{tip|on-hit}}. This effect also grants her {{sti|range|525 range}} prior to ascending to {{sbc|Arisen}}.

After ascending to {{sbc|Aflame}}, ''Starfire Spellblade'' is upgraded, causing the basic attack to explode around the target, dealing {{as|100% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} (affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers) to all enemies struck and applying {{tip|on-hit}} effects to each.
''Starfire Spellblade'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Kayle's''' basic attack timer.
e1.notes:
* The ability consist of 3 different damage source types:
** The basic attack part is {{tip|basic damage|basic}}.
** The passive on-hit {{as|magic damage}} is {{tip|proc damage|proc}}.
** The active's {{as|magic damage}} based on the {{as|'''missing''' health}} of the target(s) applies {{tip|spell damage|spell}}.
** The damage against secondary targets caught in the explosion is also tagged as [[area of effect]].
* The basic attack portion of the ability is a normal basic attack and will be reduced by {{ii|Ninja Tabi}}, even when it's upgraded to an area of effect.
** {{ii|Randuin's Omen}} will also reduce the damage if it does {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}}.
* While the effect is active a circle is visible to '''Kayle''', indicating her {{sti|range}}. 
** However, this circle only takes into account {{ais|Divine Ascent|Kayle}} effect on her range, not other sources such as {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}}.
** The increased range will be {{sti|range|675}} prior to ascending to {{sbc|Transcendent}}, after which it's {{sti|range|725}}.
* Single-use on-hits (Such as {{nie|Spellblade}}) will be applied to the main target.
** If the main target died prior to the projectile reaching them, or if it was a [[Jungle plants|jungle plant]], the effects will be applied to the closest target from the explosion's center.
** Exception: {{iis|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} {{nie|Phantom Hit}} can only be applied to the main target.
* Because ''Starfire Spellblade'' has both basic attack and ability components, it will proc {{iis|Muramana}} {{nie|Shock}} twice.
** The double proc only occurs if the {{as|'''missing''' health}} based {{as|magic damage}} deals more than 0 damage.
** Only the main target can receive double proc, other targets caught by the explosion do not.
* Parry interactions:
** {{tip|blind|Blind}}: The main target will never receive damage but secondary targets struck in the explosion will receive the {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} based on their {{as|'''missing''' health}}.
** {{tip|Dodge}}: Dodging will always negate all damage.
** {{tip|Block}}: Blocking will always negate all damage.
*** Even if the main target is inside {{ais|Spirit's Refuge|Shen}} zone, targets struck in the explosion outside of the area won't block the damage.
* Basic attacks empowered by ''Starfire Spellblade'' have some differences compared to normal basic attacks:
** The melee range is increased to {{sti|range|200}}.
** The projectile speed for the ranged attack is 2000.
* ''Starfire Spellblade'' can behave both as a {{tip|ranged}} and {{tip|melee}} attack based on how far the target is prior to '''Kayle''' ascending to {{sbc|Arisen}}, after which the attack will be always using ranged standards.
** If the target is {{sti|range|200}} units away or closer, the attack will be considered melee.
** If the target is over {{sti|range|200}} units, the attack will be considered ranged.

effects.str: • Passive Damage: (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 25% AP)

r1.name: Divine Judgment
description: {{sbc|Active:}} At the start of the cast time, '''Kayle''' grants herself or an allied champion {{tip|invulnerable|invulnerability}} for a few seconds, conjuring swords of holy fire, and highlighting the area around the target.
Upon completing the cast time, the swords rain down, dealing {{as|magic damage}} in the highlighted area.
''Divine Judgment'' will prioritize casting on allies over '''Kayle'''.
r1.notes:
* ''Divine Judgment's'' cast time does not interrupt movement.
* Prior to becoming {{sbc|Transcended}}, casting ''Divine Judgment'' refreshes the duration of {{ai|Zealous|Kayle}} stacks.
* ''Divine Judgment's'' effects will persist even if '''Kayle''' dies during the cast time.
** The target may still die via {{tip|Nexus Obelisk}}, but the ability will still finish at their position regardless.
* '''Kayle's''' basic attack range is set to {{sti|range|400}} during ''Divine Judgment's'' cast time to bring her within the effective range of the ability if attack commands are issued on an enemy.
** {{iis|Rapid Firecannon}} {{nie|Energized}} behaves strangely with this effect: 
*** Before {{sbc|Transcended:}} After the cast starts it changes from {{sti|range|400}} range to {{sti|range|337}} range, then after the cast ends it changes from {{sti|range|612}} range to {{sti|range|675}} range (attack range while ''Energized'').
*** After {{sbc|Transcended:}} The values are the same after the cast starts, but changes after the cast ends, going from {{sti|range|662}} range to {{sti|range|725}} range (attack range while ''Energized'').
*** Gaining ''Energized'' during the cast time will cause the range to jump between values, averaged around 540 range.
* The area around the target does not appear if the target is not {{tip|sight|visible}} to the enemies' point of view.
* While the target is {{tip|invulnerable}}, a number indicator will appear beneath them whenever they would receive damage to show the amount that was entirely mitigated. This is calculated pre-mitigation, or before resistances and reductions are taken into account.
* The {{tip|invulnerable|invulnerability}} is granted via a buff called [[File:Divine Judgment.png|20px|link=]] '''Intervention'''.

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 80% AP)
